newsitem.title: FRANCE: Colt telecom to start French service June 1.
newsitem.headline: Colt telecom to start French service June 1.

text.p: Colt Telecom Group Plc said on Tuesday it would start services in France on June 1 with a fibre-optic network in Paris and the La Defense office area.
The network is currently some 15 kilometres long, linking La Defense and the central Paris area Bourse-Opera-Etoile where many financial institutions have their offices.
Before the end of the year the network will be some 36 kilometres long, the company said.
